info.description:
======================================
Fleet Vehicle Model Compatible Product
======================================

.. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
   !! This file is generated by oca-gen-addon-readme !!
   !! changes will be overwritten.                   !!
   !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

.. |badge5| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/runbot-Try%20me-875A7B.png

This module extends the fleet management functionality. Allows you to define which products are compatible with the vehicle model.

**Table of contents**

.. contents::
   :local:

Configuration
=============

To configure this module, you will need to set up products for vehicle Model.

#. Go to Fleet > Vechicles > Compatible Products
#. Create or edit product
#. Configure product Can be Vehicle Product
#. Configure product type
#. Got to Fleet > Configuration > Model
#. Create or edit vehicle model
#. Select Products for the this vehicle model

Bug Tracker
===========

Bugs are tracked on `GitHub Issues <https://github.com/OCA/fleet/issues>`_.
In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported.
If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed
`feedback <https://github.com/OCA/fleet/issues/new?body=module:%20fleet_vehicle_model_compatible_product%0Aversion:%2012.0%0A%0A**Steps%20to%20reproduce**%0A-%20...%0A%0A**Current%20behavior**%0A%0A**Expected%20behavior**>`_.

Do not contact contributors directly about support or help with technical issues.
